casebody.data:
Jerome THORPE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2017

Stephanie L. Evans, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Jerome Thorpe's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 904, 158 A.3d 448 (2017), is denied.
